title: French artist inspired by Chinese pop culture (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Artwork by Hoel Duret Nine artworks by French artist Hoel Duret are on display at Beijing Yishu 8, marking his debut solo exhibition in China . His art, inspired by many elements of Chinese popular
